title: My Friend FRED: The St. Louis Fedâ€™s Free Tool for Economic Data
description: FRED is a free economic database provided by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis, offering over 200,000 data series to help journalists add context to their economic stories. It allows users to import data into graphs and Excel spreadsheets, compare local and national data, and more.
keywords: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
